body:
Hi Mostapha,

Sorry for my late reply. When I run the simulation, my computer often showed "out of memory". I doubt the problem is because the RAM of my computer is too small (only 2G). When it crashed again, I will record the output and send it to you.

Besides, I found when I input a box with three layers, the splitbuildingmass component only generate a two layers box. What seems to be the trouble? The attachment is the file. Thank you for your help.

Yunsong Han

attachments.name: the problem of the split building mass.gh
